subject: Testing servlets
msgSnippet: Hi, Can someone send a sample code to test a servlet based application either using JUnit(if possible) or J2EEUnit ? Cheers, Sachin ... From: selena su
messageBody:
Hi,

Can someone send a sample code to test a servlet based application either
using JUnit(if possible) or J2EEUnit ?

Cheers,

Sachin
